text: Danilo Fioravanti (23 August 1913 – 5 May 1997) was an Italian gymnast. He competed at the 1936 and 1948 Olympics and finished in fifth place with the Italian team. His best individual result was 12th place on the vault in 1936. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Gymnasts at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts
title: Danilo Fioravanti
